description.value: You're so immersed in divine scripture that you find meaning and guidance for any situation in your texts. Spend 10 minutes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Decipher Writing]{Deciphering Writing} on religious scriptures of your deity or philosophy while thinking about a particular problem or conundrum you face, and then attempt a Religion check (DC determined by the GM). If you succeed, you unearth a relevant passage, parable, or aphorism that can help you move forward or change your thinking to help solve your conundrum.
